title: [DEAD] Indiana Jones & the Temple of Doom (1984) - Steven Spielb
description:
Disc II - Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984) - /English/+ Subs/ - DvdRip

___________________________


Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
Directed by Steven Spielberg
 
Genre: Adventure

Tagline: If adventure has a name... it must be Indiana Jones.

Plot Outline: Renowned archeologist and expert in the occult, Dr. Indiana Jones, is back in action in the 2nd Indy film. He teams up with a night club singer and a 12 year old named Short Round. They end up in an Indian village, where the people believe evil spirits have taken their children away after a sacred stone was stolen. Indiana agrees to try and retrieve the stone for the villagers.

___________________________


Modified DVD Rip with DvdShrink; THX Setup bonus feature were removed (useless, we didn't wait for this DVD to setup our sound system...)
The rest is untouched !
